share on x cr carmen rizo. jun 11 at 12:47 am to the cruz family i am so sorry for your loss. she was a very nice lady i will remember her every time i will see her she will always say hi. may she rip. love :heart: carmelita rizo as she would call mecomment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... currently no events are scheduled. wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe sunset memorial oaks funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
